website_summaries.verdict: A full $50 cheaper than the Bose SoundDock, the JBL On Stage 400P offers a solid alternative for iPod owners who want clear audio and present bass from a reasonably compact speaker.
pros: The JBL On Stage 400P offers clear, detailed audio and an impressive low-end response for its size
It's compatible with all docking iPods and is magnetically shielded against iPhone interference
There's an auxiliary line input for using the speaker with the Shuffle and any other MP3 player
cons: The JBL On Stage 400P doesn't have many extra features, such as an FM tuner or alarm clock
It does not offer a battery power option

customer_reviews.title: A pretty good docking station
customer_reviews.text: Positives: The sound is good, very rich. The footprint is reasonably small Negatives: The remote is line of sight, meaning it must be pointed at the unit. The remote doesn't have an option to power on/off the unit The iPhone dock won't work with the Otter Box phone case unless you use a dock extender
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best MP3 Player
customer_reviews.text: I have over 30 years experience as a audio professional. I always seek out the best of the best and the JBL ONSTAGE 400P is the finest IPod/IPhone Dock product ever. The sound quality out performs Bose and any others. The high notes and low notes are clear and do not distort at full volume. The speaker shape sends the sound wave out in a stereo surround effect that fills the room. I want one now in every room. This product is absolutely awesome. I use it with my IPhone 3GS. I am buying more for Christmas gifts. Paul McDonald/Memphis Remember: What ELVIS did all over the world started in Memphis!
customer_reviews.author: Jay P. Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Level of satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Bass speaker cracks at medium volume. I imagine that was the original problem before the refurbishing. Not satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.author: Cybink

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, very pleased for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this dock, the quality of the sound has been great for us to use for entertainment at home and during parties. Can get very loud without losing crisp sound. Depending on the type of iPhone case you have you may need to remove it for the phone to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOUNDDOCK  I LOVE IT !!!
customer_reviews.text: Really a great sound. I recomend this sounddock ...!! Better than a Bose sound I use it on my bedroom and the sound is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Ana Maria

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase this product over the Bose based on reviews and price. I am extremely pleased with JBL docking station. It is simple to use and has an amazing sound. I really like the bass response from such a compact design. Absolutely no regrets with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Seems to perform as reviewed
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived probably faster than represented. Have used it for several weeks now and it has decent sound, good volume and although I haven't taken it anywhere it is small enough to even take on a plane although you can only use it were you can plug it in. Use it for most of my music with my iphone. No problems with compatibility.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Gruskin

customer_reviews.title: Sound good - remote MIA (I have it but it doesn't work)
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great when it is working . . . remote stopped working within a few days after arrival and I can't find a way to replace a battery . . . disappointing in that part of the package :-(
customer_reviews.author: lorryatamer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT ITEM
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my son. It arrived quickly. It was priced right, packaged well but best of all, it sounds and looks great. Very happy with this product, would reccomend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Beemer51

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing how clear can you hear everything on this JBL 400 super A!!!! Very nice !!!!
customer_reviews.author: hector chiquito

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, easy to use. The only complaint is about the remote. It is difficult to find the right position in relation to the speaker; it seems it only works if pointing directly to the lower portion of the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really ROCKS!
customer_reviews.text: This item sounds great and is easy to use. Plug and play. No distortion even if turned up all the way. I love It!
customer_reviews.author: James D Silvio

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ipod dock to use in a small room I've converted to an exercise room. The sound from this little guy exceeds my expectations, and my husband was equally impressed by its performance. Experts might notice imperfections, but I have to say I have been more than satisfied by the quality of sound and the range of volume with my dock.
customer_reviews.author: Tnstudent

customer_reviews.title: broken immediately
customer_reviews.text: volume control on the product does not work and did not work from the moment we started using it. I am bitter.
customer_reviews.author: Neil F. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great and Holds Up
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these sitting on my desk for several years, and couldn't be happier. I was able to hear it side-by-side with the Bose unit available at the time, and the JBL sounded better. Not only that, it was far less expensive. It has worked flawlessly with an iPhone 3G, then a 4S, and now a Samsung Galaxy S4 (connected to the 3.5mm Audio In jack on the back). It gets heavy daily use (Monday-Friday), and has never given me any problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Chambers

customer_reviews.title: The speaker Dock is excellent, but not its remote control
customer_reviews.text: For its price, this speaker dock for iPod is excellent. But the remote stopped to work after 9 months of not so extensive use and for not reason at all. I changed the battery. But it still doesn't work. Where could I find a remote? I don't know. It you know, please, tell me.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: JBL On Stage 400P
customer_reviews.text: I just got my JBL On Stage 400P, work great and sound great, I think it's better then Bose. remote is easy to use. Apple store for $229.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Great Sounding Dock !!!
customer_reviews.text: I just picked up the JBL 400P based on reviews I read on the web and I am very pleased with this unit. It has a great sound, works with all apps (including Sirius streaming which was a must for me) and charges my iPhone while it is docked. The only complaint I have is that the power cord has a bulky AC adapter with it, which is hard to conceal. Overall a great unit, and I highly recommend it if you want a great quality sounding dock.
customer_reviews.author: Silvertint

customer_reviews.title: All perfect except remote control
customer_reviews.text: Superb sound, neat design - great purchase overall. Except remote control which hardly works :)
customer_reviews.author: cmarg00

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT SOUNDS GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: BY FAR THE BEST IN THE MARKET NOTHING COMPARES TO THIS IN EVERY CATEGORY!!!! MUST HAVE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mo Tech

product_meta.title: JBL On Stage 400P Speaker Dock for iPhone/iPod (Black)
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe JBL On Stage 400P loudspeaker dock is a complete sound system for your iPod and iPhone - one that will become the new center point of your personal entertainment space. Imagine a total audio system in one place, with no extra wires running across your table or desk. Connected to your new-generation iPod, iPhone, MP3 player or other music source, the JBL On Stage 400P system produces clean, powerful sound, letting you take complete control of your music. Drivers One Atlas neodymium and four Odyssey transducers Power Output 15 Watts per channel Frequency Response 40Hz - 20kHz Input Impedance >10k Ohms Signal-to-Noise Ratio >85dB Voltage Input 110V - 240V AC Input Requirement - Main connection - docking connector for iPod; auxiliary connection - 3.5mm (1/8) stereo mini jack Compatibility - All docking versions of the iPod (including nano G3, iPod classic, iPod touch and iPhone), MP3 and CD players, and desktop and laptop computers (all platforms) Unit Dimensions - 14.25 x 3.74 x 7.20, Weight - 3.74 lbs.

AMAZON.COM
The JBL On Stage 400P loudspeaker dock is a complete sound system for the iPod and iPhone--one that will become the new centerpoint of your personal entertainment space. Imagine a total audio system in one place, with no extra wires running across your table or desk. Connected to your iPod, iPhone, MP3 player, or other music source, the JBL On Stage 400P system produces clean, powerful sound, letting you take complete control of your music. 

 

 

Compatibility
The JBL On Stage 400P loudspeaker system is compatible with docking versions of the iPod as well as the iPhone. A stereo mini jack connection also allows you to enjoy high-quality audio from a variety of other devices such as MP3 and CD players, desktop computers (all platforms), satellite radio, and laptops.


Easy-to-Use Music and Navigation Controls
Just a touch of the music controls increases or decreases the volume. Using the navigation controls, browse songs, playlists and photos, change tracks and settings, and more. With the JBL On Stage 400P RF remote, you have complete control of your iPod or iPhone, as if it were in your hand.

Connection Versatility
The JBL On Stage 400P system is a multimedia focal point. Enjoy your iPod or iPhone, view photos or videos, and listen to virtually any other auxiliary audio component, all through the JBL On Stage 400P loudspeaker dock. Connect the USB cable to your computer for full compatibility with iPod and iTunes. Using your iPhone with the On Stage 400P? No need to put your iPhone into airplane mode. The On Stage 400P will let you interrupt your music to take a call and then seamlessly go right back to playing your tunes.


Digital Power and DSP
The system features a powerfully tuned digital audio path. The clean and compact digital amplification, coupled with DSP (digital signal processing) equalization, efficiently provides the transducers with cool-running power.

Additional Features


 * Smart remote--The Smart remote has several modes of operation. The Music mode allows you to control the volume, change tracks, fast forward, and fast reverse. The Navigation mode allows you to navigate menus for your iPod or iPhone, just as if you were controlling the device itself. You can access your music, view your slideshows, and find and play your videos.
   
 * Evercharge topology--The JBL On Stage 400P system charges your iPod or iPhone, even when not connected to the computer or if the system is off. 

Advanced Technology
The JBL On Stage 400P loudspeaker dock combines many proprietary technologies for the highest quality sound, offering astonishing bass and clear sound from any direction.

 * Odyssey and Atlas transducers--The Odyssey drivers provide accurate high frequencies, while the Atlas woofer produces clean, powerful bass.
   
 * Slipstream port design--The JBL On Stage 400P port minimizes boundary layer separation, resulting in high-output bass with low distortion.
   
 * COE (Computer-Optimized Equalization)--The JBL On Stage 400P system equalization is computer-optimized, for a rich, complete soundstage.
   
 * OCT (Optimized Compression Topology)--The proprietary compression technology ensures clean, accurate sound at high output levels. 

What's in the Box
JBL On Stage 400P, iPod adapters, IR remote, power supply, audio cable
feature_bullets: Digital amplification and DSP(digital sound processing) gives you great sound.
Includes an RF remote with full iPod navigation.
Evercharge topology charges iPod even unit is switched off.
